markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Killing Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=2628) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Star Orb](/Feats.aspx?ID=2622)

</column>

---

Your star orb hides a deadly miasma. You can cast 5th-level [_cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42) as a divine innate spell once per day. The spell's normal components are replaced with a focus component (your star orb) and a somatic component to aim the orb towards the location for the spell.
name: Killing Stone

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Killing Stone Source Ancestry Guide pg. 125 2.0 Prerequisites Star Orb --- Your star orb hides a deadly miasma. You can cast 5th-level cloudkill as a divine innate spell once per day. The spell's normal components are replaced with a focus component (your star orb) and a somatic component to aim the orb towards the location for the spell.
